CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 4, 1960, pg. B7 reads: South Hills Queen - Shirley Baldwin, seated center, wears the victory smile as winner of the recent "May Queen" contest at South Hills Baptist Church, Beltzhoover. Standing, left to right: Sandra Miller, second place winner, Janice Tigner, crowning the "Queen"; Dorothy Wilson, who won third prize honors, and Chirstian Jones, who placed fourth.  The contest was sponsored by the ushers board of which Mrs. Rebecca Farmer is president and Mrs. Alice Clements is chairman. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of May Queen contestants, from left, Sandra Miller, Janice Tigner, crowning "Queen" Shirley Baldwin, Dorothy Wilson, and Chirstian Jones, posed in South Hills Baptist Church, Beltzhoover, another version
